mapper.select: select report_time from t_finance_analysis group by report_time having count(report_time) > 1 ORDER BY report_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.stock_company_id, b.stock_code, b.name, b.last_price, a.total_income, a.total_add_percent, a.net_profit, a.net_profit_percent, a.profit_total_percent, a.report_time, a.report_type FROM t_finance_analysis a LEFT JOIN t_company_stock b on a.stock_company_id = b.id WHERE 1=1
and b.name like CONCAT('%', #{request.name} , '%')
and b.stock_code like CONCAT('%', #{request.stockCode} , '%')
and a.report_time = #{request.reportTime}
ORDER BY a.total_income DESC
ORDER BY a.net_profit DESC
ORDER BY a.total_add_percent DESC
ORDER BY a.net_profit_percent DESC
ORDER BY a.profit_total_percent DESC
ORDER BY a.updated_time DESC
